solution_line_template: The amoeba will divide into {amoebae_start} * {split_factor} = <<{amoebae_start}*{split_factor}={amoebae_after_1}>>{amoebae_after_1} amoebae after {days_per_division} days.
The amoeba will divide into {amoebae_after_1} * {split_factor} = <<{amoebae_after_1}*{split_factor}={amoebae_after_2}>>{amoebae_after_2} amoebae after {days_after_2} days.
The amoeba will divide into {amoebae_after_2} * {split_factor} = <<{amoebae_after_2}*{split_factor}={amoebae_after_3}>>{amoebae_after_3} amoebae after {days_after_3} days.
The amoeba will divide into {amoebae_after_3} * {split_factor} = <<{amoebae_after_3}*{split_factor}={amoebae_after_4}>>{amoebae_after_4} amoebae after {days_after_4} days.
